The endothermic peaks in the Fig. 4 mainly indicate destruction of the physical hydrogen bonds between the chitosan molecules and the physical crosslinking formed between the mixtures and the rearrangement of the gelatin’s triple helix structure. The increase in the thermal stability of the composite membrane and the decrease in endothermic degree are due to the bonding among gelatin and chitosan and DAS in different ways, and crosslinking is an important way of bonding
